definitions.definition: Order of battle; disposition or arrangement of troops or of a naval force , ready for action .
An army in battle array; also, the main battalia or body of the army, as distinct from the vanguard and rear .

main_definition: ( obsolete , uncountable ) Order of battle; disposition or arrangement of troops or of a naval force , ready for action .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , countable ) An army in battle array; also, the main battalia or body of the army, as distinct from the vanguard and rear .
